validation.namespaceSpaceWarningText: Warning: Spaces in namespaces will work in principle, but can lead to problems in some features
validation.contact-invalid: Contact must be a valid mail address

help.namespaceHelpText: The namespace of the repository. This name will be part of the repository url.
help.nameHelpText: The name of the repository. This name will be part of the repository url.
help.typeHelpText: The type of the repository (e.g. Mercurial, Git or Subversion).
help.contactHelpText: Email address of the person who is responsible for this repository.
help.descriptionHelpText: A short description of the repository.
help.initializeRepository: Creates an initial branch and commits a basic README.md.
help.importUrlHelpText: Import the whole repository including all branches and tags via remote url
help.usernameHelpText: Username may be required to import the remote repository. Will be ignored if not provided.
help.passwordHelpText: Password may be required to import the remote repository. Will be ignored if not provided.

overview.title: Repositories
overview.subtitle: Overview of available repositories
overview.invalidNamespace: No repositories found. It's likely that the selected namespace does not exist.

create.title: Add Repository
create.subtitle: Create a new repository
create.noTypes: Cannot create new repository because no repository type is available. Please ensure at least one repository type is enabled.

import.subtitle: Import existing repository

compressed.label: Compressed
compressed.helpText: Check only if your dump file is compressed.

bundle.title: Dump File
bundle.helpText: Select dump file from which the repository should be imported.

password.title: Password
password.helpText: Provide a password for encrypted dumps

fullImport.title: SCM-Manager Repository Archive
fullImport.helpText: Select the archive file which should be imported. The archive must have been exported from an SCM-Manager instance.

password.title: Password
password.helpText: If the imported repository archive have to be decrypted the correct password must be provided.

pending.subtitle: Importing Repository...
pending.infoText: Your repository is currently being imported. This may take a moment. You will be forwarded as soon as the import is finished. If you leave this page you cannot return to find out the import status. But you can continue using the SCM-Manager in another tab/window.

url.label: Import via URL
url.helpText: The Repository will be imported via the provided URL.

bundle.label: Import from dump without metadata
bundle.helpText: The repository will be imported from a dump file without SCM-Manager specific metadata.

fullImport.label: Import from SCM-Manager dump with metadata
fullImport.helpText: The dump containing the data must be generated by a SCM-Manager instance and include specific metadata.

import.navigationWarning: It is strongly recommend that you stay on this page until the import is finished. Leaving this page could abort your import. Leave page anyway?

aheadBehind.tooltip: {{ahead}} commit(s) ahead, {{behind}} commit(s) behind default branch

confirmAlert.title: Delete Branch
confirmAlert.message: Do you really want to delete the branch "{{branch}}"?

selector.title: Select branch, tag or revision
selector.emptyResult: No results matching the filter were found.

error.exists: This tag already exists in this repository.
error.format: The tag name does not match the correct format.

create.title: Create a New Tag
create.hint: The tag will be automatically signed with your default key by the SCM-Manager.

delete.subtitle: Delete Tag
delete.description: Deleted tag can not be restored.

confirmAlert.title: Delete Tag
confirmAlert.message: Do you really want to delete the tag "{{tag}}"?

code.noBranches: No sources found for this repository.

changesets.noChangesets: No changesets found for this branch. The commits could have been removed.

changeset.label: Changeset
changeset.diffNotSupported: Diff of changesets is not supported by the type of repository

commitAuthor.author: Author
commitAuthor.noMail: We have found no email address for your current user. We will use the generated address shown below.

healthCheckWarning.title: The latest health check for this repository reported failures. Click here for more details.
healthCheckWarning.subtitle: To rerun the health check, click the button in the "Health Check" part blow.

export.subtitle: Repository Export
export.notification: Attention: During the export the repository cannot be modified. When creating a new export, the old export is deleted. Generated repository exports are automatically deleted after 10 days.

compressed.label: Compress
compressed.helpText: Compress the export dump size to reduce the download size.

fullExport.label: With metadata
fullExport.helpText: In addition to the repository dump, metadata about the repository and SCM instance is exported. Ensure that installed plugins are up to date. Stored passwords will not work if this is imported in other instances of SCM-Manager.

encrypt.label: Encrypt
encrypt.helpText: The export file will be encrypted using the provided password.

password.label: Password
password.helpText: Enter the password for encrypted files.

exportInfo.repositoryArchive:
This export contains: 
- the repository
- the metadata which exist for this repository, e.g. from plugins
- an environment description for the exporting SCM-Manager
- additional information for this repository
exportInfo.encrypted: Encrypted: The stored export has been encrypted.
exportInfo.interrupted: Interrupted: The export was aborted during creation. Possibly due to a server restart.

fileTree.name: Name
fileTree.notYetComputed: Not yet computed, will be updated in a short while
fileTree.computationAborted: The computation took too long and was aborted

sources.noSources: No sources found for this branch.
sources.moreFilesAvailable: These are just the first {{count}} files. There are more files available.

confirm-alert.title: Delete Permission
confirm-alert.message: Do you really want to delete the permission?

add-permission.name-input-invalid: Permission is not allowed to be empty! If it is not empty, your input name is invalid or it already exists!

help.groupPermissionHelpText: States if a permission is a group permission. If this is not checked, it is a user permission.
help.nameHelpText: Manage permissions for a specific user or group.
help.roleHelpText: READ = read; WRITE = read and write; OWNER = read, write and also the ability to manage the properties and permissions. If nothing is selected here, use the 'Advanced' Button to see detailed permissions.
help.permissionsHelpText: Use this to specify your own set of permissions regardless of predefined roles.

deleteRepo.subtitle: Delete Repository
deleteRepo.description: Deleted repositories can not be restored.

confirmAlert.title: Delete Repository
confirmAlert.message: Do you really want to delete the repository?

renameRepo.subtitle: Rename this Repository
renameRepo.description1: The repository can only be accessed by its new name.
renameRepo.description2: Namespace Permissions must be set again if the namespace is changed.

archiveRepo.subtitle: Archive this repository
archiveRepo.description: An archived repository can no longer be modified.

confirmAlert.title: Archive Repository
confirmAlert.message: Shall the repository really be archived?

unarchiveRepo.subtitle: Remove Archive Mark
unarchiveRepo.description: When the archive mark is removed, this repository can be modified again.

confirmAlert.title: Remove Archive Mark
confirmAlert.message: Shall the archive mark really be removed?

runHealthCheck.subtitle: Health Checks
runHealthCheck.descriptionNotRunning: Run the health checks for this repository. This may take a while.
runHealthCheck.descriptionRunning: Health checks for this repository are currently running and cannot be started again in parallel.

reindex.subtitle: Recreate Search Indices
reindex.description: Deletes all existing search indices for this repository and recreates them from scratch. This may take a while.
reindex.started: Reindexing has been started successfully. This is an asynchronous operation and may take a while.

archive.tooltip: Read only. The archive cannot be changed.

exporting.tooltip: Read only. The repository is currently being exported.

healthCheckFailure.tooltip: This repository has health check failures. Click to get details.
healthCheckFailure.title: Health Check Failures

diff.jumpToTarget: Jump to the previous version of the file
diff.noDiffFound: No Diff between the selected branches found.

fileUpload.clickHere: Click here to select your file

input.help: Type 2 or more letters to search for a filepath in the repository

notifications.queryToShort: Type at least two characters to start the search
